description: Want to ace your Florida real estate Broker / Salesperson / Agent exam?  Look not further!  This Upward Mobility app for Palm webOS contains 433 questions covering essential vocabulary state exam specific knowledge.  Each question is paired with a concise but detailed explanation to ensure comprehension.  || All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process. || This app contains 200 questions specific to content on the Florida state real estate exam, and 233 questions of key Real Estate vocabulary.  Topics include:  Legal Aspects, Encumbrances, Real Estate Law, Financing Escrow, Contracts, Taxation, Subdivision, Business Opportunities, Land Descriptions, Appraisal and Vocabulary. ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
